projectDescription: creating garden with open space for school grounds and child play area

milestones.title: Site Survey and Design Preparation
milestones.description: Site inspection and survey, Understanding the client requirements, Designing the layout of the garden and open space, Finalizing the design with the client
milestones.paymentDetails: : 20% of the total project cost upon approval of the design

milestones.title: Groundwork and Landscaping
milestones.description: Ground clearing and preparation, Implementing the landscaping design, Planting trees, shrubs, and flowers, Setting up the irrigation system
milestones.paymentDetails: : 30% of the total project cost upon completion of this phase

milestones.title: Construction of Child Play Area
milestones.description: Selection and procurement of play equipment, Installation of play equipment, Safety checks and measures
milestones.paymentDetails: : 30% of the total project cost upon completion of this phase

milestones.title: Final Touches and Handover
milestones.description: Installation of benches, trash bins, and other amenities, Final landscaping touches, Cleanup of the site, Handover to the client
milestones.paymentDetails: : Remaining 20% of the total project cost upon successful handover of the project.
